attributes.action: ensure that all hens and chickens will be farmed in the free range method by no later than 2010 and that even 'enriched' cages will not be used.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to ask the government to ensure that all hens and chickens will be free range by 2010. European legislation promises this will happen by 2012 but saying that 'enriched' cages will still be used. This is a campaign to ask that these animals do not have to suffer in awful living conditions and can live the way they are supposed to live. They deserve their freedom.
